blogPost.title: What is the “scapegoat mechanism” and why does it matter? Answer by @lukeburgis, author of Wanting, 4x Founder & CEO, Professor of Business. https://t.co/63RcW9HJC0 https://t.co/VNxe5BQHrh
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: スケープゴート・メカニズム」とは何か、なぜそれが重要なのか？Answer by @lukeburgis, author of Wanting, 4x Founder & CEO, Professor of Business. https://t.co/63RcW9HJC0 https://t.co/VNxe5BQHrh
什么是 "替罪羊机制"，它为什么重要？回答者：@lukeburgis，《想要》的作者，4x创始人& CEO，商业教授。https://t.co/63RcW9HJC0 https://t.co/VNxe5BQHrh
什麼是 "替罪羊機制"，它爲什麼重要？回答者：@lukeburgis，《想要》的作者，4x創始人& CEO，商業教授。https://t.co/63RcW9HJC0 https://t.co/VNxe5BQHrh

previous.title: What are your best tips for navigating difficult conversations? Answer by @xsvengoechea, Author of Listen Like You Mean It. https://t.co/sbcG6oqjRH https://t.co/JPZpCgnXx5

localize.full_text: 難しい会話を乗り越えるためのベストなヒントを教えてください。Answer by @xsvengoechea, Author of Listen Like You Mean It. https://t.co/sbcG6oqjRH https://t.co/JPZpCgnXx5
你有哪些驾驭困难对话的最佳技巧？回答者：@xsvengoechea, Listen Like You Mean It的作者。https://t.co/sbcG6oqjRH https://t.co/JPZpCgnXx5
你有哪些駕馭困難對話的最佳技巧？回答者：@xsvengoechea, Listen Like You Mean It的作者。https://t.co/sbcG6oqjRH https://t.co/JPZpCgnXx5

next.title: What are some of the biggest telltale signs that a product idea won't work? Answer by @julespieri, author of "How We Make Stuff Now". https://t.co/0UT5j5Rsfs https://t.co/4LgIOCs3wf

localize.full_text: 製品のアイデアがうまくいかない最大の兆候は何ですか？How We Make Stuff Now "の著者、@julespieri氏による回答です。https://t.co/0UT5j5Rsfs https://t.co/4LgIOCs3wf
一个产品创意不会成功的最大信号是什么？回答者：@julespieri，《我们现在如何制造东西》的作者。https://t.co/0UT5j5Rsfs https://t.co/4LgIOCs3wf
一個產品創意不會成功的最大信號是什麼？回答者：@julespieri，《我們現在如何製造東西》的作者。https://t.co/0UT5j5Rsfs https://t.co/4LgIOCs3wf
